name: SC To Top
author: Sergio Costa

sections.description: A simple plugin to scroll to the top
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have jQuery installed and working properly
  2. Upload the folder sc-to-top to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to plugin’s options page and choose your configuration
  5. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Make sure you have jQuery installed and working properly
  2. Upload the folder sc-to-top to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to plugin’s options page and choose your configuration
  5. Enjoy!

Can I modify the colors?

Not YET.

The scroll is not smooth! What can I do?

This plugin requires jQuery. Check if jQuery is being called correctly .

If I found some problem, should I report you?

Yes, of course you should! Just email, me: sergio.costa@outlook.com ! Thank you! ðŸ˜‰
